header_text: AutoCAD and Revit API Training in Peru
chunk_text:
AutoCAD and Revit API Training in Peru

My colleague Augusto Gon√ßalves points out that we are holding Spanish-language AutoCAD .NET and Revit API training classes in Lima, Peru on April 7-8, and April 9, 2014, respectively.

To participate in either one, please complete the registration survey.
